# Load Packages

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message=F)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(tidymodels)
library(ggpubr)
library(tsibble)
library(ingredients)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

# Load Data

```{r}
# n = 6 (original data)
data_n6 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n6_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 5
data_n5 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n5_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 4
data_n4 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n4_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 3
data_n3 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n3_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 2
data_n2 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n2_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()

# n = 1
data_n1 <- readRDS(here("data/processed_data/wbe_covid_n1_week.rds")) %>% drop_na()
```

# Split data

```{r}
data_n6_train <- data_n6 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n6_test <- data_n6 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n5_train <- data_n5 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n5_test <- data_n5 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n4_train <- data_n4 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n4_test <- data_n4 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n3_train <- data_n3 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n3_test <- data_n3 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n2_train <- data_n2 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n2_test <- data_n2 %>% tail(n = 50)

data_n1_train <- data_n1 %>% head(n = 75)
data_n1_test <- data_n1 %>% tail(n = 50)
```

# Model tuning

## Define model

```{r}
#define model
rf_model <- rand_forest(
  mtry = tune(), 
  trees = 1000, 
  min_n = tune()) %>% 
  set_engine("ranger", importance = "permutation") %>% 
  set_mode("regression") 

#define null model
null_model <- null_model() %>% 
  set_engine("parsnip") %>% 
  set_mode("regression")
```

## Define recipes

```{r}
vl_n6_recipe <- recipe(log10_cases ~ 
              A_N1+A_N2+B_N1+B_N2+C_N1+C_N2+week,
              data = data_n6_train) %>% 
              update_role(week, new_role = "ID") 

vl_n5_recipe <- recipe(log10_cases ~ 
              A_N1+A_N2+B_N1+B_N2+C_N1+C_N2+week,
              data = data_n5_train) %>% 
              update_role(week, new_role = "ID") 

vl_n4_recipe <- recipe(log10_cases ~ 
              A_N1+A_N2+B_N1+B_N2+C_N1+C_N2+week,
              data = data_n4_train) %>% 
              update_role(week, new_role = "ID")

vl_n3_recipe <- recipe(log10_cases ~ 
              A_N1+A_N2+B_N1+B_N2+C_N1+C_N2+week,
              data = data_n3_train) %>% 
              update_role(week, new_role = "ID")

vl_n2_recipe <- recipe(log10_cases ~ 
              A_N1+A_N2+B_N1+B_N2+C_N1+C_N2+week,
              data = data_n2_train) %>% 
              update_role(week, new_role = "ID")

vl_n1_recipe <- recipe(log10_cases ~ 
              A_N1+A_N2+B_N1+B_N2+C_N1+C_N2+week,
              data = data_n1_train) %>% 
              update_role(week, new_role = "ID")
```

## Create workflows

```{r}
#workflow for viral load models (to be tuned)
vl_workflow_n6 <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(rf_model) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n6_recipe)

#workflow for null models
vl_null_workflow_n6 <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(null_model) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n6_recipe)

vl_null_workflow_n1 <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(null_model) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n1_recipe)
```

## Set up cross-validation

```{r}
set.seed(13)
folds_n6 <- vfold_cv(data_n6_train)
```

## Define tuning grid

```{r}
doParallel::registerDoParallel()

set.seed(345)
tune_rf_2 <- tune_grid(
  vl_workflow_n6,
  resamples = folds_n6,
  grid = 20)
```

```{r}
#check RMSE
tune_rf_2 %>%
  collect_metrics() %>%
  filter(.metric == "rmse") %>%
  select(mean, min_n, mtry) %>%
  pivot_longer(min_n:mtry,
    values_to = "value",
    names_to = "parameter"
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(value, mean, color = parameter)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~parameter, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "RMSE")
```

```{r}
#check RSQ
tune_rf_2 %>%
  collect_metrics() %>%
  filter(.metric == "rsq") %>%
  select(mean, min_n, mtry) %>%
  pivot_longer(min_n:mtry,
    values_to = "value",
    names_to = "parameter"
  ) %>%
  ggplot(aes(value, mean, color = parameter)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~parameter, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "R-Squared")
```

## Select the best model

```{r}
#select the best model based on RMSE
best_rmse_2 <- tune_rf_2 %>%
  select_best(metric = "rmse")

final_rf_2 <- finalize_model(rf_model, best_rmse_2)

final_rf_2
```

# Model fitting & CV

## Create final workflows

```{r}
vl_n6_final_wf <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(final_rf_2) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n6_recipe)

vl_n5_final_wf <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(final_rf_2) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n5_recipe)

vl_n4_final_wf <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(final_rf_2) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n4_recipe)

vl_n3_final_wf <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(final_rf_2) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n3_recipe)

vl_n2_final_wf <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(final_rf_2) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n2_recipe)

vl_n1_final_wf <- workflow() %>% 
  add_model(final_rf_2) %>% 
  add_recipe(vl_n1_recipe)
```

## n = 6

```{r}
#fit model to data
set.seed(13)
fit_vl_n6 <- vl_n6_final_wf %>% 
  fit(data = data_n6_train)

#create folds for cross validation
set.seed(13)
folds_vl_n6 <- vfold_cv(data_n6_train, 
                        v = nrow(data_n6_train))

#run cross validation
set.seed(13)
cv_vl_n6 <- fit_resamples(vl_n6_final_wf, resamples = folds_vl_n6)
cv_vl_n6_metrics <- collect_metrics(cv_vl_n6,summarize = F)
vl_n6_metrics_sum <- collect_metrics(cv_vl_n6,summarize = T)

#check cross validation metrics
vl_n6_metrics_sum
```

### Null model

```{r}
#create folds for cross validation
set.seed(13)
folds_vl_n6_null <- vfold_cv(data_n6_train, 
                        v = nrow(data_n6_train))

#run cross validation
set.seed(13)
cv_vl_n6_null <- fit_resamples(vl_null_workflow_n6, 
                                resamples = folds_vl_n6_null)
cv_vl_n6_metrics_null <- collect_metrics(cv_vl_n6_null ,summarize = F)
vl_n6_metrics_null_sum <- collect_metrics(cv_vl_n6_null ,summarize = T)

#check cross validation metrics
vl_n6_metrics_null_sum
```

## Export results

```{r}
cv_vl_n6_metrics <- cv_vl_n6_metrics %>% mutate(.config="vl_n6",
                                                feature="vl")
cv_vl_n5_metrics <- cv_vl_n5_metrics %>% mutate(.config="vl_n5",
                                                feature="vl")
cv_vl_n4_metrics <- cv_vl_n4_metrics %>% mutate(.config="vl_n4",
                                                feature="vl")
cv_vl_n3_metrics <- cv_vl_n3_metrics %>% mutate(.config="vl_n3",
                                                feature="vl")
cv_vl_n2_metrics <- cv_vl_n2_metrics %>% mutate(.config="vl_n2",
                                                feature="vl")
cv_vl_n1_metrics <- cv_vl_n1_metrics %>% mutate(.config="vl_n1",
                                                feature="vl")

cv_metrics_vl <- rbind(cv_vl_n1_metrics,
                       cv_vl_n2_metrics,
                       cv_vl_n3_metrics,
                       cv_vl_n4_metrics,
                       cv_vl_n5_metrics,
                       cv_vl_n6_metrics)

saveRDS(cv_metrics_vl, 
        here("data/processed_data/rand_forest/cv_metrics_vl.rds"))
```
